name: Celmoornia: A fun RPG game!
description:
Welcome to Celmoornia!

Celmoornia is a work-in-progress RPG game made in unity!
Celmoornia is an ancient civilisation, that is slowly being taken over by an evil scientist and you must save it!

Also once a week, we aim to add another work-in-progress version, for you to give feedback!

We also have a page on gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/celmoornia/370453       On this game, we have an up-to-date development log!
